application.views

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.views.GameView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObserver, Disableable, UIComponent, java.rmi.Remote

    public class GameView
extends java.lang.Object
implements UIComponent, Disableable, GameObserver
    Game view contains the entire visualisation of the game after the lobby. It contains multiple sub-views as well
    Author:
    Sanchez
